statements: SELECT * FROM geofence_alerts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, geofence_name, alert_message FROM geofence_alerts WHERE geofence_type = 'entry';
SELECT geofence_name, alert_timestamp FROM geofence_alerts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM geofence_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, geofence_type FROM geofence_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM geofence_alerts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT geofence_name, alert_timestamp FROM geofence_alerts WHERE geofence_type = 'entry' AND alert_timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, user_id, geofence_type FROM geofence_alerts WHERE geofence_type = 'exit' ORDER BY id;
SELECT DISTINCT geofence_name FROM geofence_alerts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, alert_message FROM geofence_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-08-01';
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas WHERE id = '1c8c3f4e-d3b9-4c58-8080-5ee2c5f0fe6f';
SELECT area_name, latitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE longitude > 0.0;
SELECT * FROM user_geofence_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'entry' ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, geofence_area_id, alert_time FROM user_geofence_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'exit';
SELECT area_name FROM geofence_areas WHERE latitude <= 40.0 AND longitude >= -80.0 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas WHERE latitude > 30 ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT id, area_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_areas WHERE longitude < -90;
SELECT ua.id, ua.user_id, ga.area_name, ua.alert_type FROM user_geofence_alerts ua JOIN geofence_areas ga ON ua.geofence_area_id = ga.id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM user_geofence_alerts WHERE alert_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, AVG(longitude) AS avg_longitude FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, alert_timestamp FROM geofence_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM geo_coordinates WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT alert_id, user_id, area_name, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM geofence_alerts WHERE area_name LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, latitude, longitude FROM geo_coordinates WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY coordinate_id ASC;

SELECT u.username, g.area_name, gc.latitude, gc.longitude FROM users u JOIN geofence_alerts g ON u.user_id = g.user_id JOIN geo_coordinates gc ON u.user_id = gc.user_id WHERE g.alert_type = 'Speed' ORDER BY gc.latitude, gc.longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofences WHERE radius > 50 ORDER BY area_name;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, message, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, alert_id FROM user_alerts;
SELECT geofence_id, area_name FROM geofences WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -80;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT geofence_id, area_name, latitude, longitude, radius FROM geofences WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'emergency' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.message, a.timestamp FROM users u JOIN alerts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM geofence_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_description FROM geofence_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT area_name, area_description FROM geofence_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, timestamp FROM users JOIN user_locations ON users.user_id = user_locations.user_id;
SELECT alert_type, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE area_id = 2 AND alert_type = 'Violation' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
